query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: DEMETER Data and Knowledge models and tools - Release 3
result.description: This deliverable will provide the third and final release of the AIM data model, of the core semantic mappings of DEMETER, formerly provided by D2.3, as well as of the data and knowledge tools and mechanisms formerly provided by D2.4, capturing the outcomes of Tasks 2.1, 2.2 and 2.3 after the delivery of the second release of their modules.
